From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod got out of the CR chamber fully healed. He walked by the bridge,
and heard the call from the Ark. He opens a comlink to the Ark.
"This is Hot Rod. I'm on my way to Lake Victorea."
Hot Rod walks outside the ship.
"Vehical mode." He transformes to car mode, and heads for the lake.

OOC: I dont know if this is too much for one post or not. If it is just
tell me.
